name: 1000% (WAVY) Virgin Indian 10-40in (NO REMY)
description:
STOP! READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY ANY HAIR ANYWHERE!

1000% Virgin all the time!
1000% No Matting No Tangling after washing!
1000% Better shed-rate than any hair online!
1000% The BEST hair you can possibly buy!
1000% Reliable and fast service!
1000% Fast shipping no long waits!

You can cut, dye, cellophane, and straighten our hair. Anything you do with your own hair you can do with these extensions. Remember if you can't do this its not real hair.

6-8oz are recommended for a full head. The shorter the hair the less ounces you'll need and the longer the hair the more ounces you'll need to have a full head. For example (10 or 12 inches you'll need 6-7 ounce to do a full head, 18 or 22 inches you'll need 8 ounces, but 30 inches you'll may need 10 ounces for a thick full head)

REASONS TO TRY EXTENSIONS US!

Our hair comes with thin wefts and thin rubberbands to maximize the amount of hair per oz. You do not need 3 bundles of our hair like those other companies.

Why do you need 3 bundles of their hair? Because those weft are very thick, the rubber band are heavy and big, then they put them on a scale only to say 3.5oz. So in reality you're getting 8 ounce of hair but paying for 10-12 ounce. 

Our hair are 4 ounces truly so you'll only need about two bundles of hair, WHICH SAVES YOU MONEY. 

This website only sells 4 or 8 ounces so if you need any other amount please don't hesitate to call us during business hours to place your order. (323)787-4298 OR (424)243-6520

ARE YOU TIRED OF BUYING HAIR THAT DELIVERS THE OPPOSITE IF WHAT I DESCRIBED? 

If so stop buying from the companies that sell hair for $60, $70, $80, and long hair for $90 per bundle. Do those prices sound right for quality hair? No! Those are the prices for remy hair right? Yes! So stop buying from companies that promise quality hair for cheap prices because chances are its cheap hair that will make you mad as soon as you wash it. 

EDUCATION:

Understand this, those hair companies buy their hair from china. India, Malaysia, or brazil is not in China ladies. Thats why the hair is so cheap because its processed hair or the bottom of the barrel hair that wholesalers still have to sell so of course the wholesale prices are $40 . Then these retail companies sell it to you for $200 and make all that money off of you but leave your head in the crapper. 

Ladies, my point is this, dont believe the hype about those cheap prices. If you want to finally BUY HAIR FROM A REAL COMPANY WITH REAL HAIR try us today. If you are not happy with the textures, which we know you will, you can send it back and we'll refund you your money back. Hair must still be bundled in the same condition to recieve a 100% refund. Shipping usually takes 2-4 days and a signature is REQUIRED to recieve your package.
